summary: Backend testing for Smith Chart and Return Loss Tune features - All 14 tests passed (100%)
critical_code_review_comments: Smith Chart data generation is correctly implemented in physics.py (lines 1120-1169)
All 7 required fields present: freq, z_real, z_imag, gamma_real, gamma_imag, inductance_nh, capacitance_pf
Physics constraints validated: |gamma| <= 1 for all points (passive network constraint)
L/C consistency correct: positive reactance -> inductance_nh > 0, negative reactance -> capacitance_pf > 0
Impedance sweep correctly shows capacitive (X<0) at low freq, inductive (X>0) at high freq
optimize-return-loss endpoint correctly uses user's selected feed_type (gamma/hairpin/direct)
Gamma match provides significant return loss improvement over direct feed (69+ dB)
AntennaOutput model correctly includes smith_chart_data field (models.py line 232)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Smith Chart and Return Loss features are fully functional. Test file covers: (1) Smith chart data for all 3 feed types, (2) correct field structure, (3) gamma magnitude physics, (4) impedance sweep behavior, (5) L/C consistency, (6) optimize-return-loss feed_type handling. Frontend is Expo Web app with React 19 SSR hydration issue - frontend testing skipped per E1 instruction.

POST /api/calculate - Smith Chart Data.gamma_feed: Returns 61 points with all required fields
POST /api/calculate - Smith Chart Data.direct_feed: Returns 61 points with all required fields
POST /api/calculate - Smith Chart Data.hairpin_feed: Returns 61 points with all required fields

Smith Chart Physics Validation.impedance_sweep: X varies from -4.6 to +4.5 ohms across band
Smith Chart Physics Validation.lc_consistency: 30 inductive points with valid L, 30 capacitive points with valid C
